title: Natural Medicines
sitename: Harvey Cushing/John Hay Whitney Medical Library
cleaned_text: Natural Medicines provides resources about thousands of natural medicines, including herbs, dietary supplements, sports supplements, minerals, and vitamins. It was created by the research and editorial staff at the Therapeutic Research Center, a team of pharmacists, physicians, dietitians, and pharmacologists, whose mission it is to provide completely independent and objective analysis of drug therapy information.
